subNodes.conversationText: root
There was a tomb here. Statues of demons flanked a wooden casket, unadorned except for a piece of red silk draped on top of it.
[Continue.]
It was not the first such tomb <FirstName> had discovered.
<He/She> read the poem on the wall.

Honeysuckle fades
The scent of plum in winter
Sweet against harsh white.
The young witch opened the casket.
<He/She> left the chamber.
The young witch opened the casket.
A skeleton lay inside. It wore ancient armor and slept beside a sword. A paper ribbon with the words "No lord but time" in calligraphy was wrapped around the mouth.
[Continue.]

A hollow voice came from the skeleton in the casket, but the skeleton itself didn't stir. "Wanderer, the sword is restless that drank its fill centuries ago, that clung to me like my own mortality. Take it."
The young witch took the sword from the casket.
The stone demons sprang to life.
[End.]
[Skip combat.]
Are you sure?
[Yes.]
[No.]

actions.a_parameter_1: Combat can always be skipped. Doing so takes 10 minutes of game time. You do not receive experience points for skipped combats.

You don't have the Swordplay trait, so you cannot wield the sword. Instead, you may break the sword during combat to unleash its magical power, doing massive damage to a single enemy. Check the item description for more information.

subNodes.conversationText: The young witch took the sword from the casket. <His/Her> training told <him/her> it was a fine weapon.
The stone demons sprang to life.
"No," thought the young witch. "I'll leave it for now."
<He/She> left the chamber.
Part of the cave wall had been made smooth, and a poem had been chiseled into it.
<FirstName> read it.

Honeysuckle fades
The scent of plum in winter
Sweet against harsh white.
The young witch opened the casket.
The young witch examined the stone demons.
<He/She> left the chamber.
The young witch examined the stone demons.

Their style was archaic, their expression imposing. There was magic here, but it was unfamiliar, neither witchcraft nor the work of Jad Bizunta. It made the already forbidding cell even more sinister.
The young witch opened the casket.
<He/She> read the poem on the wall.

Honeysuckle fades
The scent of plum in winter
Sweet against harsh white.
<He/She> left the chamber.
The young witch opened the casket.
<He/She> left the chamber.
<FirstName> returned to the tomb.
<He/She> took the sword.
The stone demons sprang to life.

actions.a_parameter_1: You don't have the Swordplay trait, so you cannot wield the sword. Instead, you may break the sword during combat to unleash its magical power, doing massive damage to a single enemy. Check the item description for more information.

A skeleton lay inside. It wore ancient armor and slept beside a sword. A paper ribbon with the words "No lord but time" in calligraphy was wrapped around the mouth.

Honeysuckle fades
The scent of plum in winter
Sweet against harsh white.
